content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 41, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 33}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft oak_wood, I need to place two oak_logs on top of each other. Therefore I will move one oak_log from slot 33 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 41, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]
thought: Since there is already one oak_log in the crafting grid, I now need to place another oak_log directly above it. Therefore I will move another oak_log from slot 33 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 41, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 33}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]

thought: I have placed two oak_logs on top of each other in the crafting grid, so now I need to place two more oak_logs in the same configuration but offset by one column. Therefore I will move another oak_log from slot 33 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 41, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 31}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]

thought: I have placed two oak_logs on top of each other in the crafting grid, so now I need to place two more oak_logs in the same configuration but offset by one column. Therefore I will move another oak_log from slot 33 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "redstone_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 12}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_fan", "quantity": 41, "index": 14}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 36, "index": 17}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 7, "index": 31}, {"type": "rabbit_hide", "quantity": 32, "index": 36}, {"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 64, "index": 37}, {"type": "dark_oak_leaves", "quantity": 28, "index": 40}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 42, "index": 45}]
thought: I have crafted the oak_wood, so now I need to move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
